biotools.summary: A program that identifies and characterizes Ribose zippers in an RNA structure given an appropriate PDB formatted file as input.  It also generates PyMol scripts to assist in the visualization of identified ribose zippers.

bioschemas.name: RZParser
bioschemas.summary: A program that identifies and characterizes Ribose zippers in an RNA structure given an appropriate PDB formatted file as input.  It also generates PyMol scripts to assist in the visualization of identified ribose zippers.
